main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a brief bright white light moving across the sky in a straight line at low altitude and high speed on 2 August 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as being half the size of the moon,The observation lasted for only 2-3 seconds,The sighting was confirmed by another civilian woman in another part of the city at the same time,No sound or exhaust was observed from the object,The object emitted a bluish-white light and appeared to move rapidly.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
